attributes.title: TRUMP 2020 ON A GRAVESTONE!!!
attributes.review: im not part of tiktok i just dont like how the app performs and works. also to mention i dont even like you trump. so idk why i got this app but TRUMP 2020 ON A GRAVESTONE!!!🌞🍄🌳

attributes.title: Why do i rate this 1 star?
attributes.review: Because Donald J. Trump is a white supremacist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, pedophilic sorry excuse for a man. thank you for your time.

attributes.title: its terrible
attributes.review: i opened the app and the first thing i saw was the hot cheeto puff it made me barf. it asked for my number which i didnt want to give because that’s personal to me. this app is terrible do not recommend 😾

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: Thought I was gonna throw up as soon as I went into the app. Horrific.

attributes.title: Yucky:/
attributes.review: App has deceptive material and actually mind control devices installed deep in the hardware that made me kill my cat. Mr trump, you owe me a new cat.

attributes.title: don’t get it it’s bad
attributes.review:
Shawty's like a melody in my head
That I can't keep out
Got me singin' like
Na na na na everyday
It's like my ipod stuck on replay, replay-ay-ay-ay
